{{menu.nombre}}

import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { userService } from '../userService'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carta', templateUrl: './carta.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carta.component.css'] }) export class CartaComponent implements OnInit{ menus: any[]=[]; constructor(private http:HttpClient,private userService: userService,){ } ngOnInit(): void { const req=this.http.post('http://localhost:8080/menus/all',""+this.userService.getUser().id); req.subscribe((aux:any) =>{ this.menus=aux; }) } }
